title: Squidly

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Strengthen your own resolve. This counts as a self-visit and does nothing else. (2 uses)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- When you perform the factional attack, it's modified depending on how many times the Discordians were visited collectively on the night you use it.
> No visits: Attack reduced to None tier.
> 1 visit: No modifiers.
> 2-3 visits: Attack upgraded to Powerful, rampages.
> 4+ visits: Attack upgraded to Unstoppable, rampages and attacks the two closest alive neighbors as well.
- On nights where the Discordians would collectively be visited 3 or more times, you will grant all Discordians besides yourself Detection immunity and heal them.
- If you're the last remaining Discordian, your attack will always resolve with the 4+ visit modifier.
- You may multitask.
- Rasen immunity.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Eliminate everyone who doesn't actually exist.
